description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 4, 6} mod 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) [n : n in [0..160] | n mod 8 in [0, 4, 6] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 02 2016(PARI) a(n)=n\3*8+[-2,0,4][n%3+1] \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 02 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
